categories: Category:Sergeants and lieutenants of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Damaris was a male Human who was a sergeant in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire. During the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock and the planet Quesh at various times.

Sergeant Damaris appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, where he was originally the Quesh Modification Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock and Quesh. He was later relabeled as the Level 34 Modification Vendor, and with the release of Game Update 4.0 he now appears on a number of other planets.
